# Cat's Grace (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Adept Spells|Adept 2]], [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (pinch of cat fur)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 252

The transmuted creature becomes more graceful, agile, and coordinated. The spell grants a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity, adding the usual benefits to AC, Reflex saves, and other uses of the Dexterity modifier.

**GM Note** 

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 2 to Level per *Dungeon Master's Guide*.
